underlying_goal: Execute a pre-defined plan to implement a Spring Boot event-sourcing based marketing consent feature with TDD approach, including domain model, service layer, REST API, and event replay functionality
friction_detail: Task 6 test failed due to timing issue where create and updateConsent events had identical timestamps, requiring a Thread.sleep workaround to separate event times.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to execute a 10-task plan for building a Spring Boot event-sourcing marketing consent system using TDD, and all tasks were completed successfully with all tests passing.
